thread.title: McDonald's customers brawl in kitchen at 5.30am as man hits woman with broom and staff flee in terror
thread.title_full: McDonald's customers brawl in kitchen at 5.30am as man hits woman with broom and staff flee in terror

author: John Scheerhout
title: McDonald's customers brawl in kitchen at 5.30am as man hits woman with broom and staff flee in terror
text:
McDonald's customers brawl in kitchen at 5.30am as man hits woman with broom and staff flee in terror One man tossed a cheeseburger and shouted "Have a f cheeseburger you d***" as the fight erupted Share By John Scheerhout Chris kitching 17:35, 5 FEB 2017 Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Two groups of teenagers fight at Stockport McDonald's Share this video Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
A violent brawl that broke out inside a McDonald's restaurant at 5.30am and spilled into the kitchen behind the counter was caught on camera. 
Shocking footage shows several people exchanging punches and a young woman being hit over the head with a broom by a man. 
The video was captured as two rowdy groups faced off inside the fast food chain's Grand Central restaurant in Stockport town centre early Sunday morning. 
Staff appeared to flee in terror as the brawl descended into complete chaos, with one combatant tossing a cheeseburger and shouting "Have a f cheeseburger you d***", the Manchester Evening News reports. A woman tackles a man as the brawl erupts in the customer area (Photo: MEN) The man hit a woman in the face with the broom (Photo: MEN) 
The punch-up took place at 5.30am. Spectators can be heard laughing as the fighting breaks out. Read More 
The brawling starts on the customer side of the counter, with footage posted on Facebook showing a woman tackling a man by jumping on his back as two others square off. 
The fight escalates and quickly spreads into the kitchen, with shocked staff powerless to intervene. Two men square off as the fight escalates (Photo: MEN) Two men wrestle as customers film the brawl on their phones (Photo: MEN) 
Two men knock over things before one grabs another in a headlock and tries to smash him into a kitchen surface as people hurl abuse and others encourage them. 
Someone shouts "You f*
